E-commerce Business Apps Landing Pages

My last commercial project.

Mighty Craft Jewelry

Genre

E-commerce

Description

Landing page connected with an online store for handmade jewelry business. Includes custom CMS. More payment options are planned to be added in the future. Fully responsive, 4k included.

Frontend
Next.js React React Hooks Redux Redux Saga Sass
Backend
Next.js API routes Vercel Functions Stripe Webhooks Stripe PaymentIntent API
